mean_en: the reporting of news and sport in newspapers and on the radio and television; the range or quality of information that is included in a book or course of study, on television, etc.
sentence: All of the media coverage is just about the lottery winner.
sentence_trans: 所有的新闻报道都是关于那个中彩票的人的。
word_etyma: cover覆盖 + age名词后缀 → coverage覆盖范围
